casaAmbar.facadeDescription: clean lines. Its facade combines noble materials, such as sintered stone and glass, with a contrasting chromatic palette and a modern composition that conveys exclusivity, balance and style.

skyView.name: Sky View
skyView.description: Sky View redefines city living by combining tranquility with modernity. This residential development stands out for its contemporary architecture, designed to offer luxury, security and comfort. The impressive terraces provide extraordinary views to the golf course and a spectacular urban panorama.

blue.name: Blue
blue.description: Discover Blue by Bosque Real, a magnificent 30-level tower comprised of 120 apartments designed under high standards of comfort and security. Surrounded by lush gardens, it offers impressive views towards the golf course and panoramic to Interlomas and Bosques de las Lomas.

nativ.name: Nativ
nativ.description: Nativ is a luxury development in Bosque Real, offering a modern and elegant architectural design. The units are equipped with high quality finishes and spacious interior areas that provide an exceptional living experience. Additionally, Nativ features amenities such as an exclusive lobby, rest areas and green spaces, promoting a comfortable and relaxing environment.

nox.name: Nox
nox.description: Nox is an exclusive development in Bosque Real, which stands out for its contemporary and sophisticated design. It has spacious and well-lit spaces, ideal for enjoying comfort and modern style. Among its amenities, you will find gym, relaxation areas and green spaces, perfect for a balanced lifestyle.

ivy.name: Ivy
ivy.description: IVY is an impressive development in Bosque Real, characterized by its modern and aesthetic design. It offers spacious interior areas with high quality finishes, in addition to amenities such as gym, green areas and pool, promoting an active and comfortable lifestyle.

reserva.name: La Reserva
reserva.description: Reserva Bosque Real is a first-class residential development that offers single-family lots in a natural and safe environment, ideal for building the house of your dreams.

life.name: Life
life.description: Life in Bosque Real is much more than an investment opportunity; it is the possibility of living in an exclusive environment that combines luxury, security and harmony with nature.

islaEncino.description1: Isla del Encino is an exclusive residential community located within the prestigious Bosque Real development in Huixquilucan,

incanto.name: Incanto
incanto.description: Welcome to Incanto Residencial in Bosque Real, your own paradise within the city! Here, modernity and luxury merge with the splendor of nature to offer you a life of harmony, security and a unique experience.
incanto.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Incanto Residencial in Bosque Real, your own paradise
